title: [1.12.2][Chocolate Quest Repoured——寻找巧克力重铸]它又回来啦
author: zidanii
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zidanii 于 2021-1-31 21:03 编辑 

在之前也有人搬运过不过是老版本https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=418940
还有一个为过期modhttps://www.mcbbs.net/thread-235484-1-1.html
我的介绍不全就可以参照他们的介绍

介绍寻找巧克力，又叫更好的地牢
它在你生成的世界添加了许多的地牢例如城堡，下城和火山，里面充斥着怪物和战利品。如果你有实力，就请尝试这去征服它们 吧！！
重铸版在原版模组的基础上不仅把模组提高到了1.12.2还进行了升级内容更加丰富，带给你更好地体验
图片展示






作者原文
CQR is a redesign of Chocolate Quest (though you might know it as better dungeons) for Minecraft 1.12.2, and probably the future.  Our first alpha build is out now! I won't stop you from putting this into modpacks, but I can't recommend it until beta. Balance and bug testing aren't really hashed out yet in the current version. While our files call themselves "betas" now, it is only because Curseforge treats alpha files strangely, we are still in alpha.  For those new to the mod, BD/CQ generates massive dungeons around your world, such as castles, nether cities, and volcanoes, filled with monsters and loot, for you to conquer... If you're strong enough.  CQR sets itself apart from most other dungeon mods largely in size and scope, with the use of its own custom mobs and loot items, as well as immense customizability, from changing the available loot to making your own entire dungeons from scratch if you're so inclined.   You can find 1.7.10 and earlier builds of the original mod here, as well as its wiki here, and follow along with our slow, slow, development, or apply to help out, in our Discord server, here.  If you have bugs to report, we'll try to get to them if you put them here or on the discord, but make no promises. For the best chance of your issue being seen and fixed, report it on our Github Issues page and send us the mod's config, your mod list, the crash report and log file if applicable.  If you're bored and want to check out other projects that involved the various members of our team, you might like Grimoire of Gaia, Pizzacraft, or Subterranean Switcheroo.   If you're looking for certain features of CQ on their own, Elementary Staffs by KrokoOnAir adds the old magic system, and is already available up to 1.15, and Tiviacz1337 made a standalone version of the Cloud Boots as well.  If you're happy and you know it, clap your hands.


已知的不兼容性





KN55FCUYW~5S}92WVN[PK[Q.png (8.61 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2020-11-11 21:43 上传






Climate Control and Geographicraft可能导致无限冻结。要修复此问题，请将 cqrepoured.cfg -> advanced -> generationRespectOtherStructures设置为false。这是另一个程序中的错误，不是我们的。（机翻见谅）

为了支持作者请在原帖下载（不用墙）
courseforgeLlibrary前置：前置

这是本人的第一个搬运贴如有问题请多多包涵并指出错误
